docs.snippet: Adrian Peterson had amassed 409 yards in two December meetings with Green Bay, but on Saturday the Packers held him to 99 yards to top Minnesota in an N.F.C. wild-card game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Adrian Peterson had amassed 409 yards in two December meetings with Green Bay, but on Saturday the Packers held him to 99 yards to top Minnesota in an N.F.C. wild-card game.

headline.seo: Vikings’ Adrian Peterson Shut Down by Packers in N.F.C. Wild-Card Loss

docs.abstract: Green Bay Packers beat Minnesota Vikings, 24-10, in NFC wild-card game; Packers quarterback Arron Rodgers delivers a stellar performance, completing 23 of 33 passes for 274 yards.

docs.abstract: Indianapolis Colts, overhauled team that has come together even in the absence of coach Chuck Pagano, is preparing to face Baltimore Ravens in upcoming AFC wild-card game; Pagano has been coaching in absentia ever since his treatment for leukemia began in the fourth week of the 2012 season.

headline.seo: In Emotional Season, the Colts Never Broke

docs.snippet: Thirty years later, Washington’s Mark Moseley remains the only kicker to win the Associated Press N.F.L. Most Valuable Player award, which dates to 1957....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thirty years later, Washington’s Mark Moseley remains the only kicker to win the Associated Press N.F.L. Most Valuable Player award, which dates to 1957.
docs.abstract: Box Seats column by Cameron Martin notes that former Washington Redskins kicker Mark Moseley is the only place-kicker to win the Associated Press NFL Most Valuable Player award, which dates to 1957.
